mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "Christmas in Square Dance Land", "The Ladies' Responsibilities Toward Square Dancing", "The Admiral Wore a Skirt", "Homes for Square Dancing", "Square Dance Associations: The Caller's Association", "Squares Good the the Finnish - Arctic Report", "Designing a Pageant for the National Convention", "The "Cram and Drift" Teaching Method", and "Are You Caller Blind?, Number Two". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "Square Dance Date Book", "As I See It", "Help for Your Square Dance Club: A Workshop Pays Off", "Chuck Jones' Note Book", "Style Series: Do Si Do", "Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop Squares and Rounds", "Paging the Roundancers: Lib and Tom Hubbard", "Caller of the Month: Nathan Hale", "Style Series: Dizzy Chain", "From the Floor", and "One the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
